Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express, #26 South Shore Express Temporary Reroute at 69th/South Shore Drive
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Exp, 26 South Shore Exp buses are temporarily rerouted via 67th, Jeffrey, 75th, and South Shore Dr due to, street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express, #26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 67th, Jeffrey, 75th, and South Shore Drive due to, street blockage.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 69th/South Shore Drive
ShortDescription: EB 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 67th, Stony Island, Marquette, Jeffrey and 67th due to, street blockage near 69th/South Shore Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 67th, Stony Island, Marquette, Jeffrey and 67th due to, street blockage near 69th/South Shore Drive.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Western
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Western due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Western due to a mechanical problem on a train.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
